definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个宣告火辣的夏天已经来临的仪式。
我认为碧昂斯超级火辣。

sentences.english: No, you won't have to eat peppers that are rated "volcanic" on the Scoville Scale.
sentences.chinese: 当然你不需要去吃火辣辣的辣椒。

sentences.english: My legs were tired with jumping and my face burned.
sentences.chinese: 我的双腿蹦得累极了，脸也冻得火辣辣的。

sentences.english: Maybe America stewardess is one of the hottest.
sentences.chinese: 可能美国空姐是最火辣的空姐之一。

sentences.english: Reiko pressed her hand to her burning cheek.
sentences.chinese: 丽考用手按着火辣辣发病的面颊。

sentences.english: We typically think of women as the targets of body objectification.
sentences.chinese: 我们通常认为女性因其火辣的身材而成为视线的焦点。

sentences.english: He had never seen such hot girl that he couldn't help fixating on her.
sentences.chinese: 他从未见过如此火辣的女孩以至于忍不住盯着她看。

sentences.english: On the flip side, this may encourage her to look as hot as possible as well.
sentences.chinese: 其次，这也能激励她也尽量保持火辣的外表。

sentences.english: I was sitting on the train this morning opposite a really sexy Thai bird.
sentences.chinese: 早上坐火车，我对面是一个超级火辣的泰国妞。

sentences.english: Already they were sweating as the sun beat down upon them.
sentences.chinese: 太阳火辣辣地晒着他们，他们已是汗如泉涌。

sentences.english: This product is currently hot sold in Japan for man and woman market.
sentences.chinese: 目前在日本火辣辣热卖中之专攻男女市场产品。

sentences.english: I move on, and you see me with my hot new girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我走出情伤，然后你看到我和我火辣的新女友。

sentences.english: His cheek tingled from the slap.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸因挨了耳光而感到火辣辣的。

sentences.english: For a fraction of a second I stood there, my face burning.
sentences.chinese: 我在那儿站了一小会儿，脸火辣辣的。

sentences.english: What's the naughtiest thing you can say in German?
sentences.chinese: 你能用德语说的最火辣的话是什么？

definition: (of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
